featureRequests.title: Spanish localization
featureRequests.description: Add Spanish language support for LessonCraft

featureRequests.title: Offline mode
featureRequests.description: Allow teachers to use app without internet

featureRequests.title: API endpoint development
featureRequests.description: Build V5 API endpoints for mobile apps

featureRequests.title: Add Protestant faith app
featureRequests.description: Add Protestant denomination to Gospel Tuned lineup

featureRequests.title: Missionary version of LessonCraft
featureRequests.description: Build a missionary-focused version of LessonCraft for LDS missionaries

featureRequests.title: Personal Fireside UI
featureRequests.description: Build dedicated UI for browsing and playing Personal Fireside episodes in the app
featureRequests.notes: Firesides now accessible via Study tab and Be Inspired view

featureRequests.title: Daily Devotional UI (Morning Light)
featureRequests.description: Build dedicated UI for daily devotionals with calendar view and audio player
featureRequests.notes: Morning Light banner on Home screen + archive in Be Inspired view

featureRequests.title: In-App Art Gallery Browser
featureRequests.description: Browse AI Tuned artwork by topic, add to lessons. ArtworkBrowserView.swift
featureRequests.notes: Gospel Art Gallery section added to Home screen — commit 83a9b0b

featureRequests.title: LessonCraft Media Dashboard
featureRequests.description: Web dashboard on command center showing all R2 media assets, play audio, view images, completion status

featureRequests.title: Cover images for all content cards
featureRequests.description: Generate beautiful LDS devotional art for each CFM week, Easter episode, Fireside, and Morning Light card. Image at top of card with title below. Use Gemini v3 style. Upload to R2, wire into catalog.
featureRequests.notes: 52 CFM covers + 8 new fireside art uploaded to R2. All wired into catalog.

featureRequests.title: Content standing approval — build freely via catalog API
featureRequests.description: Jeff approved blanket content production as long as it goes through R2 + Cloudflare Workers catalog system. No hardcoding in app.

featureRequests.title: Easter artwork — v3 LDS devotional style locked in
featureRequests.description: Approved style: soft diffused light, muted palette, approachable Christ, no halos/crosses/baroque. Generator: Gemini.

featureRequests.title: Share Card feature
featureRequests.description: ShareCardRenderer renders 1080x1350px share images. Share button in episode player toolbar. Shares image + lessoncraft.app/daily/{id} URL for growth loop.

featureRequests.title: Web Preview /daily/{id} pages
featureRequests.description: Cloudflare Worker serving /daily/{episodeId} pages with OG/Twitter meta tags, artwork hero, audio player, App Store button. Apple Universal Links (AASA) deployed.
featureRequests.notes: Deployed to api.aituned.io. Still needs lessoncraft.app domain routing (Jeff action).

featureRequests.title: Intent-driven Home screen redesign
featureRequests.description: New Home screen: time-of-day greeting, Morning Light banner, 3 intent cards (Prepare/Learn/Be Inspired), Continue Listening, This Week's Study. New tabs: Home/Prepare/Study/Profile. Killed Fireside tab.

featureRequests.title: Artwork similarity audit
featureRequests.description: Pull all 113 R2 images, compare pairs visually. Flag duplicates/too-similar, categorize: keep/rework/replace/invert. Generate replacements with varied compositions.
featureRequests.notes: 20 new diverse pieces being generated. Full visual audit pending.

featureRequests.title: Voice re-generation with new roster
featureRequests.description: Re-generate all existing audio with locked-in voice roster: Jared/Cedar, Nathan/Ash, Sarah/Nova, Emily/Marin, Hannah/Sage, Kristi/Nova.
featureRequests.notes: 267 files re-generated, 0 failures. All voices now correct.

featureRequests.title: lessoncraft.app domain routing for deep links
featureRequests.description: Set up lessoncraft.app DNS to route to Cloudflare Worker for /daily/{id} deep links and Apple Universal Links.
featureRequests.notes: Needs Jeff to configure domain. AASA file ready.

featureRequests.title: Read-along narration text in documentary segments
featureRequests.description: Add synchronized text display during audio playback for documentary episodes

featureRequests.title: CFM Teaching Coach Enhancement
featureRequests.description: After Jared's closing, add CTA for 'How to Teach This Week's Lesson' — lesson framework, engagement strategies, key points, references back to documentary. Warm close with varied encouragement + Spirit as teaching partner. Also inline technical term explanations during narration.
featureRequests.notes: Jeff said 'Yes! Love it.' Spec: ~/developer/LessonCraft/specs/cfm-teaching-coach-feature.md. Sample generated for Week 7 (commit d9c7a0b).

featureRequests.title: JD Art Gallery — in-app browser + print ordering
featureRequests.description: Jacque Dubois Fine Art Gallery inside LessonCraft. Browse by collection, set wallpapers (free), order prints via Printful. Home screen jump card. Multiple collections: Sacred, Patriotic, Folk Art, Watercolor, Art Nouveau, Parables.
featureRequests.notes: Commits 36c69f2 + bae4890. JDGalleryView, JDArtworkDetailView, JDGalleryService. 85 pieces on R2.

featureRequests.title: Printful print-on-demand integration
featureRequests.description: White-label print store: users order canvas prints from JD Gallery via Printful. Zero inventory, zero shipping. 14 products created with 4 size variants each.
featureRequests.notes: Printful account live (Store ID 17699313). Print Store Phase 1 UI built (PrintOrderView). Phase 2: Stripe checkout webhook Worker built but needs deploy.

featureRequests.title: Subscription system (StoreKit 2)
featureRequests.description: 3 tiers: $4.99/mo, $39.99/yr, $1.99/mo student. PaywallView + SubscriptionManager + SubscriptionGate with demo bypass for beta.
featureRequests.notes: SubscriptionManager.swift, PaywallView.swift, SubscriptionGate.swift. isDemoMode=true for beta.

featureRequests.title: Stripe webhook for Cloudflare Worker
featureRequests.description: Stripe checkout.session.completed webhook handler in aituned-api Worker. Verifies signature, creates Printful order automatically.
featureRequests.notes: Built by stripe-webhook-build sub-agent. Dry-run validated. Needs: wrangler secret put STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET + wrangler deploy.

featureRequests.title: jacquedubois.art gallery website
featureRequests.description: Single-file dark gallery website for J. Dubois art. Filterable by collection, lightbox modal with print details, App Store link. Pulls from R2 catalog.
featureRequests.notes: Built by jd-gallery-website sub-agent. Located: ~/developer/aituned-api/sites/jacquedubois.art/index.html. Needs domain registration (Jeff action).

featureRequests.title: Episode description expandable + shareable
featureRequests.description: Episode descriptions now expandable and shareable in the app UI.

featureRequests.title: CFM episodes use dedicated R2 cover art
featureRequests.description: CFM episodes now pull dedicated period-correct cover art from R2 instead of random hash-picked artwork.
